## useMagic() function

Convienience hook for connecting to magic link

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useMagic(): (email: string) => Promise<{
    data?: import("wagmi-core").ConnectorData<any> | undefined;
    error?: Error | undefined;
}>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

(email: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;{ data?: import("wagmi-core").ConnectorData&lt;any&gt; \| undefined; error?: Error \| undefined; }&gt;

a function that will prompt the user to connect their magic link
